org.jreserve.grscript.gui.eventbus
Interface EventBus<T>

public interface EventBus<T>

Version:
1.0
Author:
Peter Decsi

Method Summary
 void publishEvent(Object event)
          Publishes the event to the listeners.
 void publishEvents(Collection events)
          Publishes the events to the listeners.
<L extends T>
void
subscribe(Class<L> clazz, EventBusListener<L> listener)
          Subscribes the listener for a given class ands it's sublcasses.
 void subscribe(EventBusListener<T> listener)
          Subscribes the listener for all kind of instances.
 void unsubscribe(EventBusListener listener)
          Unsubscribes the listener from all instances.
 

Method Detail

publishEvent

void publishEvent(Object event)
Publishes the event to the listeners.

Throws:
NullPointerException - if event is null.

publishEvents

void publishEvents(Collection events)
Publishes the events to the listeners. Eache unique element will be published only once.

Throws:
NullPointerException - if any elements of events is null.

subscribe

void subscribe(EventBusListener<T> listener)
Subscribes the listener for all kind of instances.

subscribe

<L extends T> void subscribe(Class<L> clazz,
                             EventBusListener<L> listener)
Subscribes the listener for a given class ands it's sublcasses. If the listener for already subscribed for a superclass, nothing will happen. If a listener was already subscribed for a sub-class, then it's subscription is widened to this class.

Throws:
NullPointerException - if one of the parameters is null.

unsubscribe

void unsubscribe(EventBusListener listener)
Unsubscribes the listener from all instances.
